summary: Comprehensive testing of Super Admin Panel for multi-tenant SaaS gamification platform. Backend: 41/41 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All 6 major features tested and working correctly.

issues: Some TEST_ prefixed plans remain from backend tests - should be cleaned up in production

passed_tests: Super Admin login with credentials admin@prizewheelpro.com / Admin123!
Admin Dashboard Overview - displays stats cards (Total Tenants, Active Campaigns, Total Plays, Revenue, Fraud Alerts)
Admin Dashboard Plan distribution breakdown
Tenants tab - list with search, status and plan filters
Tenants tab - view tenant button navigates to detail page
Tenant Detail - Overview with stats cards and 7-day plays chart
Tenant Detail - Owner and Staff sections
Plans & Stripe tab - Stripe Configuration section with mode badge
Plans & Stripe tab - Stripe settings dialog with all key fields
Plans & Stripe tab - Plans list with edit/delete actions
Messages tab - list messages with type icons and read counts
Messages tab - create broadcast message dialog
Audit Logs tab - enhanced logs with category/action filters
Audit Logs tab - displays 43+ audit entries from test actions
Fraud Alerts tab - Fraud flags table (currently empty)
Fraud Alerts tab - Active bans section with IP list
Fraud Alerts tab - Create IP ban dialog and functionality
Tenant Detail Exports tab - GDPR compliant notice displayed
Tenant Detail Exports tab - Players, Plays, Codes export buttons
Tenant Detail Notes tab - Internal notes with add/delete
Backend API: Plans CRUD (create, read, update, delete)
Backend API: Stripe settings encrypted storage and masked retrieval
Backend API: Tenant list with filters and tenant detail
Backend API: Admin messages create/delete
Backend API: Audit logs with category filtering
Backend API: Fraud bans (IP, device, identity) CRUD
Backend API: CSV exports for players, plays, codes
Backend API: Tenant notes CRUD
Backend API: Proper 401 responses for unauthenticated requests
critical_code_review_comments: Encryption utilities properly implemented using Fernet symmetric encryption
All sensitive keys (Stripe secrets) are encrypted at rest
Audit logging implemented for all admin actions
Proper role-based access control with require_super_admin decorator
GDPR compliance: consent-gated exports properly mask PII without marketing consent
seed_data_creation: Backend tests created and cleaned up TEST_ prefixed data for plans, messages, and bans
context_for_next_testing_agent: Super Admin Panel fully functional. All 6 features (Stripe Config, Plans CRUD, Tenant Management with detail page, Admin Messaging, Enhanced Audit Logs, Fraud Center with bans) are working. Backend API tests in /app/backend/tests/test_admin_panel.py cover all endpoints. No mocked APIs - all integrations are real.

features_verified.stripe_configuration: Encrypted keys, masked display, test/live mode toggle
features_verified.plans_crud: Create, update, delete (soft), list with pricing
features_verified.tenant_management: List with filters, detail page with 5 tabs, plan change, notes
features_verified.admin_messaging: Broadcast and targeted messages, type selection
